mapper.select: SELECT bt.board_id, bt.board_title, bt.board_content, bt.board_date, bt.product_price, bt.board_address, ut.username, ut.profile_img, ut.temperature, ct.category_name FROM board_tb bt LEFT OUTER JOIN user_tb ut ON (bt.user_id = ut.user_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN category_tb ct ON (bt.category_id = ct.category_id);
